text1: The boulder was a first attempt to a new age of domain era midline destroyer. Although cheap, it received subsequent criticism for its lack of firepower.
Lacking the flux and armor to work on his own, but too big to be a fighter, the Gress-class is an escort frigate. Meant to be expandable, the design is cheap and used across the sector.
A Terran world devastated by human hands. Lifeless and forgotten.
